name: Dongha Lee 0003
content: Dongha Lee Dongha Lee Assistant Professor Data & Language Intelligence Lab. @ Yonsei Department of Aritifial Intelligence Yonsei University Adjunct Professor Graduate School of Aritifial Intelligence POSTECH Email  / Google Scholar  / Github Biography I am an assistant professor in the Department of Artificial Intelligence at Yonsei University. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from POSTECH where I was advised by Prof. Hwanjo Yu. During my Ph.D., I was fortunate to work as a visiting scholar at UT Health, under the supervision of Prof. Xiaoqian Jiang. After completing my Ph.D., I worked as a postdoctoral research fellow at the UIUC with my advisor, Prof. Jiawei Han.
